auth_login_link: Already have an account? Login here.
auth_register_link: Don't have an account? Register here.
discord_earn: Join the Backyard Monsters Refitted Discord community to earn Shiny and more!
disabled_gifts: Gifts are currently disabled on Backyard Monster Refitted.
disabled_mail: Mail is currently disabled on Backyard Monster Refitted.
disabled_daveclub: Dave Club is currently disabled on Backyard Monster Refitted.
disabled_addshiny: Sorry... you cannot add Shiny on Backyard Monsters Refitted. To find out more please visit our Discord.
inferno_msg_disabled: Inferno is currently disabled in Backyard Monsters Refitted. For more information visit our discord.
err_loading_base: Whoops... it looks like we ran into an issue trying to load your base. Please report this error in our discord with your username.
acad_confirmcancel: Are you sure you want to stop #v1#'s training?
acad_err_cantupgrade:
You can not upgrade this Academy as it's currently training.

First open it and cancel the training.
acad_err_cantrecycle:
You can not recycle this Academy as it's currently training.

First open it and cancel the training.
acad_stream_description: We have the technology. Better. Stronger. Faster.
acad_stream_title: Behold! #fname#'s #v1# has graduated from the Monster Academy and is now level #v2#.
acad_tut_1:
Welcome to the Monster Academy
The Monster Academy trains your monsters to be more effective in battle.
acad_tut_2: Use the arrows to select which monster you'd like to train.
acad_tut_3: Each Academy can only train one monster species at a time. However, you can always build more than one Monster Academy!
acad_tut_4:
Once a monster has completed training, all Monsters of that species will be upgraded.
Start Training!
ai_abunakki_description: Known for their savagery, the Abunakki wear the bones of their enemies as jewelry.
ai_abunakki_fail: Your attack failed. Raise a new army and attack them again before they start repairing!
ai_abunakki_succ: It'll be a long time before the Abunakki Tribe thinks about messing with you again.
ai_abunakki_succstream: #fname# just destroyed an Abunakki monster base. Known for their savagery, the Abunakki tribe wear the bones of their enemies as jewelry.
ai_abunakki_taunt: We'll be back for your bones!
ai_dread_description: The Dreadnauts utilize advanced technology and science to build superior weaponry.
ai_dread_fail: Your attack failed. Raise a new army and attack them again before they start repairing!
ai_dread_succ: It'll be a long time before the Dreadnaut Tribe thinks about messing with you again.
ai_dread_succstream: #fname# just destroyed a Dreadnaut monster base. The Dreadnaut tribe utilize advanced technology and science to build superior weaponry.
ai_kozu_description: The Kozu tribe utilize exalted masonry to construct master mazes to defend their bases.
ai_kozu_fail: Your attack failed. Raise a new army and attack them again before they start repairing!
ai_kozu_succ: It'll be a long time before the Kozu Tribe thinks about messing with you again.
ai_kozu_succstream: #fname# just destroyed a Kozu monster base. The Kozu tribe utilize exalted masonry to construct master mazes to defend their bases.
ai_kozu_taunt: The source of our power is a secret.
ai_legion_description: The Legionnaires are keen military tacticians and are well-known for their unwavering valor in battle.
ai_legion_fail: Your attack failed. Raise a new army and attack them again before they start repairing!
ai_legion_succ: It'll be a long time before the Legionnaire Tribe thinks about messing with you again.
ai_legion_succstream: #fname# just destroyed a Legionnaire monster base. The Legionnaire tribe are keen military tacticians and are well-known for their unwavering valor in battle.
ai_trojan_trap:
It was a trap!
Who didn't see that coming?
ai_trojan_letter:
Dear #v1#,
Too much needless blood has been spilled on our yards. It is time we let our monsters live out the rest of their days in peace.

Let this be known as Armistice Day! As a token of our sincerity, please accept this wooden memorial.
ai_trojan_headline: Wild Monsters left you a note pinned to a large wooden structure.
ai_gooddefense: You successfully defended your yard from an attack by the #v1# Tribe
ai_gooddefense_streamtitle: Boo-Ya! #fname# successfully defended their yard against the #v1# Wild Monster Tribe.
ai_poordefense_tb: You took some damage in that attack
ai_poordefense_tc: Build some defensive towers and traps to better defend your yard from looters and attackers.
attack_gooddefense: You successfully defended your yard from an attack by #v1#
attack_gooddefense_streamtitle: #fname# successfully defended their yard from an attack by #v1#.
attack_taunt_streambody: Your defenses were no match for my dominant invasion.
attack_msg_attackover: Attack over, click the 'End Attack' button at the bottom of the screen to return to your yard.
attack_log_downedlooted: A level #v1# #v2# was knocked down. #v1# of the banked resources were looted.
attack_log_downed_repaircancel: A level #v1# #v2# was knocked down. Cancelling the repair.
attack_log_downed_buildcancel: A level #v1# #v2# was knocked down while building. Construction has been stopped!
attack_log_downed_upgradecancel: A level #v1# #v2# was knocked down while upgrading to level #v3#.
bait_tut_1: The Wild Monster Baiter (WMB), which sprays a intoxicating Monster Musk, attracts Wild Monsters and allows players to test their defenses.
bait_tut_2: Select the direction of the test attack by clicking the arrows.
bait_tut_3: Click the "+" and "-" buttons to add or remove monsters from the attack. You can hold them down to add more than one at a time.
bait_tut_4: Press the "Start Spraying" button to begin.
bait_tut_5: Monster Musk refills gradually over time, but can be immediately replenished in the General Store.
bait_tut_6: Upgrading the Wild Monster Baiter increases the capacity for attacks.
base_builderr_uth: Upgrade Town Hall to build more.
base_builderr_onlybuildx: You can only build #v1# of these.
base_uperr_th: You need to build a town hall to upgrade.
base_pleasehelp: Thanks for visiting. One of my buildings needs your help. Could you click on it and give me a hand please?
base_pleasehelpx: Thanks for visiting. #v1# of my buildings need your help. Could you click on it and give me a hand please?
base_nohelpneeded: Thanks for visiting. I don't need help with anything at the moment, but please check back later.
base_5alreadyhelped: 5 friends have helped this building already and it can't be helped any more.
base_alreadyhelped: You have already helped with this building, you've done all you can for this upgrade.
base_thankbuild: Thanks! You just knocked #v1# off the build time of my #v2#.
base_thankupgrade: Thanks! You just knocked #v1# off the upgrade time of my #v2#.
base_maptohelp: To help #v1# you need to first build a Map Room in your own yard.
base_damaged_body: Give #v1# a heads up that their yard is in need of repairs.
base_damaged_streambody: Your base is in dire need of repairs.
bdg_acorn_desc: Stock up for the winter in case there's a backyard cold snap.
bdg_tent_desc: Built with spring-loaded poles, this tent can be pitched in a matter of seconds.
bdg_jax_desc: Not much of barricade, but they look cool.
bdg_gnome_desc: The Garden Gnome's cheery demeanor wards off evil spirits.
bdg_monsterskull_desc: No backyard warlord's yard is complete without the skull on stick.
bdg_rubiksolved_desc: Reserved for monsters with an IQ over 160.
bdg_outhouse_desc: Don't make your monsters go in the yard - it's embarrassing.
bdg_rock_desc: Left over from the Pet Rock fad of the 70s.
bdg_scaleelectric_desc: At the top of every monster's Christmas list.
bdg_sundial_desc: Monsters are never late when they own a sundial.
bdg_tikitorch_desc: Turn your backyard into a luau. Mai Tai's not included.
bdg_tombstone_desc: Ashes to ashes, goo to goo.
bdg_pokeyhead_desc: A warning to any Pokey thinking of attacking your yard.
bdg_octohead_desc: A warning to any Octo-Ooze thinking of attacking your yard.
bdg_bolthead_desc: A warning to any Bolt thinking of attacking your yard.
bdg_banditohead_desc: A warning sign to any Bandito thinking of attacking your yard.
bdg_brainhead_desc: A warning sign to any Brain thinking of attacking your yard.
bdg_crabhead_desc: A warning sign to any Crabatron thinking of attacking your yard.
bdg_davehead_desc: A warning sign to any D.A.V.E. thinking of attacking your yard.
bdg_eyerahead_desc: A warning sign to any Eye-ra thinking of attacking your yard.
bdg_fanghead_desc: A warning sign to any Fang thinking of attacking your yard.
bdg_finkhead_desc: A warning sign to any Fink thinking of attacking your yard.
bdg_ichihead_desc: A warning sign to any Ichi thinking of attacking your yard.
bdg_projectxhead_desc: A warning sign to any Project X thinking of attacking your yard.
bdg_cactus_desc: No need to water this desert plant.
bdg_sign_description: Leave a note for a friend... or enemy.
bdg_pinkflowers_desc: Add a little color to your backyard with some pink flowers.
bdg_purpleflowers_desc: Add a little color to your backyard with some purple flowers.
bdg_redflowers_desc: Add a little color to your backyard with some red flowers.
bdg_whiteflowers_desc: Add a little color to your backyard with some white flowers.
bdg_yellowflowers_desc: Add a little color to your backyard with some yellow flowers.
bdg_baseballstatue_desc: Hit a homerun with this shiny trophy.
bdg_footballstatue_desc: Score a touchdown with this shiny trophy.
bdg_soccerstatue_desc: Score a goal with this shiny trophy.
bdg_pool_desc: Take a dip in the pool and cool off.
bdg_zengarden_desc: Be master of mind rather than mastered by mind.
bdg_fountain_desc: Let the sound of running water wash away your worries.
bdg_teagarden_desc: Stroll the grounds while sipping a cup of soothing monster tea.
boobytrap_desc: Invisible to the enemy until it is too late. Triggered when a Monster steps on it, deals large damage to a small area. Place close to buildings or use walls with gaps to group attackers into a small space.
cannontower_desc: Short range but high damage, this towers shells explode on impact, great for taking out tightly-packed groups.
catapult_desc: A siege weapon, the Catapult hurls Twig at enemy bases to damage buildings. Upgrade to increase firepower!
cloc_err_cantupgrade: Building is unlocking the #v1#. You must wait for this to finish or cancel it before you can upgrade
cloc_err_cantrecycle: Are you sure you want to recycle this building? This can not be undone and will cancel the unlocking of the #v1#
cloc_upgrade_streamtitle: #fname#'s Monster Locker has been upgraded to Level #v1#
flinger_desc: Flings your monsters into battle! This building is required if you wish to attack another player. Use the Map Room to find and target enemy yards.
generalstore_desc: Spend your Shiny on time saving upgrades.
goofactory_desc: Produces Goo. Goo is used in the Hatchery to produce monsters.
hwn_visit: Visit your backyard on Halloween and click the Giant Pumpkin for a special surprise!
hwn_mini_title: Your Daily Pumpkin, Wheel of Trick or Treats
hwn_treat_body: A new mini-pumpkin will grow in your yard each day between now and Halloween.
hat_damaged: Hatchery more than 50% damaged Repair to continue production.
hat_headline: Goo goes in, monsters come out!
hat_needgoo: Production paused Not enough Goo to start.
hat_needhousing: Production paused, Not enough room in your Housing.
hat_producing_message: Select monsters from below to add to the queue.
hat_queuefull: Queue is full; click slots to remove monsters or wait.
hat_tut_1: Hatcheries convert Goo into monsters. Building more than one Hatchery allows you to produce monsters faster.
hat_tut_2: Click on a monster to start production. Clicking on a monster multiple times continues to add them to the queue.
hat_tut_3: Purchasing the "Hatchery Overdrive" in the General Store dramatically speeds up overall monster production time.
hatchery_desc: Converts Goo produced by the Goo Factory into the creatures you have unlocked in the Monster Locker
hcc_desc: Control all of your Hatcheries from a single building. You add monsters to one build queue and it sends instructions to whichever Hatchery becomes available first.
hcc_headline: One building to rule them all
hcc_space_description:
Housing space
Add monsters to the queue until the housing space gets used up.
hcc_tut_1:
Welcome to the HCC.
This building gives you control over all your Hatcheries. It also allows you to see when your housing will be full so you better plan your monster army.
hcc_tut_2: Moving your mouse over a monster tells you all about it.
hcc_tut_3: Clicking on a monster adds it to the queue. Each queue slot can hold up to 20 monsters, allowing you to have a total of 140 monsters queued up at any time.
hcc_tut_4: The monster in the first queue slot will be sent to whichever Hatchery becomes available first.
hcc_tut_5: If you click on a monster in the queue or in a Hatchery it will be removed / canceled.
hcc_tut_6: You can see how much space you have in your Monster Housing and how much space the monsters in the queue will take up when finished.
hcc_tut_7: You can add more monsters to the queue than your housing can hold. They'll just wait in the Hatcheries for more housing space to become available.
hcc_tut_8: If the HCC is knocked down in an attack all production will stop, so keep it well protected!
housing_desc: Stores the creatures you produce in the Hatchery, upgrade or build more to increase capacity.
lasertower_desc: Deadly and fast, this plasma energy tower zaps any invading enemy at the speed of light.
mail_nomessages: You have no messages. Send some to your friends!
map_msg_damaged: Your Map Room is more than 50% damaged from an attack, please repair it to gain access.
map_msg_notbuilt: You need to build a "Map Room" first, click on "Buildings" at the bottom.
map_msg_disabled:
The Map Room is currently disabled in Backyard Monsters Refitted.

We are aiming to get this working for our beta release.

For more information join our discord.
map_msg_attackconfirm: Are you sure you want to attack #v1#?
map_msg_attackfriend: Really?! You want to attack #v1#? We thought you were friends.
map_msg_attackingdisabled:
Attacking disabled - pending game update
We are about to update the game! Updates sometimes cause errors for those playing, for this reason we have paused the ability to start attacks to prevent you wasting your monsters.

After the update you can check the forum (press "Discuss" above the game) for the list of changes.
map_msg_dp: #v1# was recently DESTROYED and is under protection for a few hours to give them a chance to rebuild.
map_msg_flingerdamaged: Your Flinger is more than 50% damaged and cannot function, please repair to resume flinging.
map_msg_flingerupgrading: Your Flinger is upgrading and can't be used to fling monsters until it is finished.
map_msg_higherlevelconfirm:
You can attack #v1# but they're a higher level than you and your monsters will have a tough time overpowering their defenses.

Also, if you do attack them, they'll have the ability to retaliate. Chances are they will destroy your base. Your call, but don't say we didn't warn you!
map_msg_inprogress: #v1# is under attack by #v2#! Please wait a few minutes then try again
map_msg_leveltoolow: You can't attack this person because their level is too low compared to yours. You will receive better loot for attacking someone closer to your level.
map_msg_needflinger: You need to build a Flinger to fling your Monsters into an enemy yard. You can find the Flinger under 'Special Structures'
map_msg_nomonsters: You have no healthy monsters in your housing, heal them or hatch more in the hatchery.
map_msg_ownerinyard: #v1# is currently in their yard. Try attacking later when the coast is clear.
map_msg_protection:
WARNING - You are protected for #v1#

Attacking anyone will remove your protection and leave you open to attacks from others.
map_msg_sp: #v1# is protected as they are new to Backyard Monsters. They will remain protected from attacks for a few more days or until they attack someone.
map_msg_truceactive: You have a truce with #v1# and can not attack them and they cannot attack you.
map_msg_vengeance:
Normally you wouldn't be able to attack a person whose level is so much lower than yours, but they were dumb enough to attack you first!

We'll let you attack them as many times as they attacked you to teach them a lesson. As they say, "Revenge is a dish best served cold."
map_trucemessage: Accept my truce and we can end all this needless bloodshed.
map_truceaccept_streamtitle: I've accepted a truce with #v1# in Backyard Monsters.
map_truceaccept_streambody: We'll finally see an end to all the needless bloodshed.
maproom_desc: Look around the world, find and help friends and select other players yards to attack.
mh_capacity_desc: Capacity of all your Houses combined
mh_footer_desc: Want to remove some monsters to make room for others? Send them into battle using the Flinger and Map Room or build the Monster Juicer found in the Buildings section of the build menu to turn unused monsters back into Goo.
mh_juicefooter_desc: Want to Juice some Monsters? Select the ones you want to add to the Juicer from the list above.
mh_headline: Holds the monsters produced by the Hatchery.
mkting_academy_body: Pump your Monsters full of steroids and build the Monster Academy to increase their Health, Damage and Speed.
mkting_catapult_body: Fling Twigs and Pebbles at your enemies and crush their defenses before you send in your Monsters.
mkting_fillapult_body: Bank and top-off your resources to increase the size and damage of your Catapult.
mkting_hcc_body: Build a Hatchery Control Center to manage production of all your monsters.
mkting_laser_body: Build a Laser Tower to quickly dispatch tight groups of monsters.
mkting_silo_body: Build more Storage Silos to hold more resources.
mkting_siloupgrade_body: You have a Storage Silo that can be upgraded. Upgrade it now to store more resources.
mkting_tesla_body: Tesla towers have excellent range and are can easily takedown stronger monsters.
mkting_overdrive_body: Overdrive your Hatcheries to produce monsters 2, 6 or 10 times quicker!
mkting_unlock_body: Your Monster Locker is sitting idle, you should start unlocking the #v1#.
mkting_unlock_title: Put your Monster Locker to work!
mkting_upgradeapult_body: Upgrade your Catapult to unlock the Pebble Bomb and rain down Pebbles in a large area of your enemies yards.
mon_alreadyunlocking: You're already unlocking a monster. Please speed it up, wait for the unlock to finish, or cancel it.
mon_banditodesc:
Bandito's thick exoskeleton and impeccable accuracy make it the perfect monster assassin.
Favorite Target: Anything
mon_banditostream: Thanks to an expedition in the Arctic tundra, #fname# has unlocked Bandito!
mon_boltdesc:
Bolt is fast as lightning and can run ahead of your other monsters to munch on buildings with its razor sharp teeth.
Favorite Target: Harvesters, Town Halls and Silos
mon_boltstream: The genome has been cracked, #fname# has unlocked Bolt! Bolt is fast as lightning and can run ahead of your other monsters to munch on buildings with its razor sharp teeth.
mon_braindesc:
Cunning and greedy, Brain's pulsating cerebral cortex and high intelligence make him perfect for looting resources.
Favorite Target: Harvesters, Town Halls and Silos
mon_brainstream: Hide your resources, #fname# has unlocked Brain!
mon_confirmcancel: Are you sure you want to cancel unlocking the #v1#?
mon_crabatrondesc:
Using its claws to snap towers like twigs, Crabatron strikes fear into the heart of its enemies.
Favorite Target: Defensive Towers
mon_crabatronstream: Discovered in the depths of the Indian Ocean, #fname# has unlocked Crabatron!
mon_wormzerdesc:
Wormzer utilizes his burrowing ability to launch surprise attacks and evade even the toughest walled defense.
Favorite Target: Anything
mon_wormzerstream: Thanks to an expedition to the Earth's core  #fname# has unlocked Wormzer.
mon_wormzerstreambody: A fierce terrestrial annelid, Wormzer utilizes his burrowing ability to launch surprise attacks and evade even the toughest walled defense.
mon_davedesc:
D.A.V.E. only listens to its master and has a habit of completely destroying bases.
Favorite Target: Anything
mon_davestream: #fname# has unlocked D.A.V.E., the most powerful monster in the world.
mon_davestreambody: The ultimate killing machine, D.A.V.E. has a habit of completely destroying bases.
mon_eyeradesc:
Warning: Eye-ra's chemical makeup combusts within close proximity to walls.
Favorite Target: Walls
mon_eyerastream: Thanks to innovations in Ophthalmology, #fname# has unlocked Eye-ra!
mon_fangdesc:
Fang's bite releases a toxic venom which liquidates any target.
Favorite Target: Anything
mon_fangstream: Employing a mixture of chaos and string theory, #fname# has unlocked Fang!
mon_finkdesc:
Found deep inside Amazonia, Fink's chemo-receptors make its attacks deadly accurate.
Favorite Target: Anything
mon_finkstream: Thanks to an expedition in the Amazon Rainforest, #fname# has unlocked Fink!
mon_ichidesc:
Discovered on the peak of Mt. Fuji, Ichi is one of the deadliest monsters and can withstand intense damage from towers and traps.
Favorite Target: Defensive Towers
mon_ichistream: Thanks to a breakthrough in Cryptozoology, #fname# has unlocked Ichi.
mon_infounlocked:
Unlocked
Produce in your Hatchery or train in your Monster Academy.
mon_infounlocking:
Unlocking
Press "Speed Up" to reduce the time remaining.
mon_needputty:
You do not have enough Putty to unlock this monster.

You can build or upgrade your Putty Squisher or you can buy extra Putty in the General Store.
mon_octooozedesc:
The slimy Octoooze soaks up fire power like a sponge so other monsters can wreak havoc.
Favorite Target: Defensive Towers
mon_octooozestream: Nurtured from a single cell in a test tube, #fname# has unlocked the Octoooze!
mon_pokeydesc:
Like a swarm of ants, a roaming pack of Pokeys can devour a grown cow in less than five minutes.
Favorite Target: Anything
mon_pokeystream: Due to advancements in technology #fname# has unlocked the Pokey!
mon_projectxdesc:
A government experiment gone terribly wrong, Project X is programmed to attack defense towers in battle.
Favorite Target: Defensive Towers
mon_projectxstream: A government experiment gone terribly wrong, Project X has escaped and joined forces with #fname#!
mon_unlockstart: DANGER: #fname#'s unlocking #v1#, Soon #fname# will have an army of #v2#'s chomping at the bit to destroy your yard. Are you ready?
mon_upgradelocker: Your #v1# needs to be upgraded to level #v2# to unlock this monster.
monsteracademy_desc: Through a demanding curriculum of physics, philosophy and physical education, your Monsters will earn their PhD in Advanced Destruction. Failing that, we have a large supply of steroids.
monsterbunker_desc: This defensive housing allows monsters to fight to the death defending your base.
monsterjuicer_desc: Got some unwanted monsters in your Housing? Want to make space for bigger and better things? Want to make a sacrifice to the Backyard Gods? Then this is the building for you! Recycle Monsters back into Goo with minimal suffering.
monsterlocker_desc: Research and unlock new monsters to hatch in the Hatchery.
msg_err_purchase: There was a problem with your purchase, no shiny was affected in this error so please just reload and try again.
msg_stopconstructionconfirm: Are you sure you want to stop construction and destroy this building? This can not be un-done
msg_recycleconfirm: Are you sure you want to recycle this building? This can not be undone
msg_juicerdamaged: The Monster Juicer is more than 50% damaged and can not function, please wait for it to repair or speed it up.
msg_juicerupgrading: The Monster Juice Loosener is upgrading, please wait for the upgrade to finish. You can speed it up by clicking on the MJL and selecting "Speed Up" or by asking friends to visit your yard to help.
msg_upgradecancelconfirm: Are you sure you want to cancel this upgrade? This can not be undone
msg_overcapacity:
You don't have room in your bank.
You need to build more or upgrade existing Storage Silo to increase your banks capacity.
msg_updatedgame: We have updated the game. Please reload.
msg_resourcesforshiny: Purchase the #v1# extra resources needed for #v2# Shiny?
msg_trucealreadyrequested: You recently requested a truce with this person and you can't request another for 2 days.
pebbleshiner_desc: Produces Pebbles. Used in the construction of buildings
planner_tut_1:
Welcome to the Yard Planner.
This building gives you a birds eye view of your Yard and makes it quick and easy to move buildings around.
planner_tut_2:
To look around:
Just click and drag the map. You can zoom in and out using the buttons at the top. If you want to move small things like wall blocks it is best to zoom in a little first.
planner_tut_3:
To move a building:
Click on a building to pick it up, then click again to put it down. You can click and drag to move around while you are holding a building.
planner_tut_4:
If you want to see which areas of your yard are protected from attackers, just turn on the tower ranges.
The red circles around each tower show the area they cover.
planner_tut_5:
Here's a tip:Try and make sure your towers protect each other by making their range circles cover each other.
Have fun re-designing your Yard!
pop_goldenmushroom_body: Congratulations! You've picked a golden mushroom worth #v1# Shiny.
pop_questcomplete_body:
Congratulations. You just completed the "#v1#" quest.

Your reward is: #v2#.
pop_pleaserate:
Enjoying our game?
Please rate it 5 stars to help us grow!
pop_timeout_body: You've been inactive for a while, are you still playing?
pop_damaged: Your base has #v1# damaged buildings. Damaged buildings have reduced productivity or just don't work.
pop_levelup_body: Keep up the good work and don't forget to brag about it.
pop_levelup_streamtitle: Start the celebration! #fname# is now level #v1#.
pop_noshiny_body: Don't worry, you're just a few clicks away from all the Shiny you could ever want or dream of.
pop_afk_title: It's better to give than receive.
pop_afk_body: Send a FREE GIFT to your friends. Who knows - maybe they'll even return the favor.
pop_invitefriends_title: Your friends are all good for now.
pop_invitefriends_body: Invite NEW friends to send gifts and get help with upgrades.
pop_invitenofriends_body: Invite friends to send gifts and get help with upgrades.
pop_hireanother_body: Wait for your worker(s) to finish or hire some extra help.
pop_acceptgifts:
Accept Gifts
You have #v1# gifts waiting to be accepted
pop_alerts:
Alerts
You have alerts! Click to view
pop_attackedyou:
#v1# attacked you!
They attacked your yard #v2# ago!
pop_attackedyouxtimes:
#v1# attacked you!
They attacked your yard #v2# times! The most recent attack was #v3# ago!
pop_experiencebar:
You have #v1# points. You need #v2# more points to reach Level #v3#.

Build, upgrade, complete quests, attack, defend well... pretty much everything you do gives you more points!
pop_invite:
Invite Friends
Select friends you think would enjoy playing Backyard Monsters
pop_mailbox:
Mailbox
Read and send messages to other players
pop_helpme: This upgrade may take a while. Invite friends and have them help speed it up!
pop_rupgraded_body: Your #v1# has finished upgrading and is now producing #v2# at a much faster rate. It also can hold more which means you can leave it longer between banking!
pop_rupgraded_streamtitle: #fname# now has a level #v1# #v2# and is on their way to the top!
pop_tupgraded_body: Your #v1# has finished upgrading and is now ready to defend your yard. Upgrading improves range, fire rate and damage!
pop_tupgraded_streamtitle: #fname# now has a level #v1# #v2# protecting their yard from Wild Monsters and other players.
pop_planner_body: Your Yard Planner is ready and waiting for you to do some landscaping!
pop_planner_streamtitle: #fname# now has a Yard Planner and is doing some 'light' landscaping.
pop_hatbuilt_body: You can now convert Goo into Monsters and start to build your Monster army!
pop_hatbuilt_streamtitle: #fname# just built a Hatchery and can now transform Goo into Monsters.
pop_hatupgraded_streamtitle: #fname#'s Hatchery has been upgraded to Level #v1# and now produces monsters faster.
pop_housingupgraded_streamtitle: #fname#'s Monster Housing has been upgraded to Level #v1#
pop_housingupgraded_streambody: It may look like a petting zoo, but don't let their cute faces fool you - these Monsters are vicious!
pop_hccbuilt_body: Your Hatchery Control Center is ready and waiting for your commands!
pop_hccbuilt_streamtitle: New advances in monster management technologies have allowed #fname# to build a Hatchery Control Center.
pop_hccbuilt_streambody: Now #fname# can control all Hatcheries from a single location.
pop_baiterbuilt_body: Congratulations! You built the Wild Monster Baiter and can now test your yard for defensive weak points. Remember, the more you upgrade the Wild Monster Baiter, the larger the test attacks can be.
pop_baiterbuilt_streamtitle: #fname# built a Wild Monster Baiter and can now test their yard for defensive weak points.
pop_baitupgraded_body: Upgrade to level #v1# completed. You now have even more Musk capacity to attract larger groups of monsters.
pop_baitupgraded_streamtitle: #fname#'s Wild Monster Baiter has been upgraded to Level #v1# and can now send larger test attacks.
pop_baitupgraded_streambody: Wild Monsters can't get enough of #fname#'s yard.
pop_laserbuilt_body: ZAP! You added a Laser Tower to your defenses. Now enemies will think twice before attacking your yard. The more you upgrade it, the more powerful it will become.
pop_laserbuilt_streamtitle: ZAP! #fname# built a Laser Tower and is incinerating monsters left and right.
pop_acadbuilt_body: You can now start training your monster army!
pop_acadbuilt_streamtitle: Fiat Lux! #fname# built a Monster Academy.
pop_acadbuilt_streambody: Through a demanding curriculum of physics, philosophy and physical education, #fname#'s Monsters will earn their PhD in Advanced Destruction.
pop_flingerupgraded_streamtitle: #fname#'s Flinger has been upgraded to Level #v1#
pop_flingerupgraded_streambody: BEWARE: #fname# can now deploy more monsters in each attack.
pop_catapultbuilt_body: Congratulations! You've built the Resource Catapult and can now launch twig missiles during an attack.
pop_catapultbuilt_streamtitle: #fname# built a Resource Catapult and can now launch twig missiles during an attack.
pop_catapultupgraded_body: Congratulations! You've upgraded the Resource Catapult to level #v1# and can now launch new resources during an attack.
pop_catapultupgraded2_streamtitle: #fname# now has a Level 2 Resource Catapult and can now launch pebble bombs during an attack.
pop_catapultupgraded3_streamtitle: #fname# now has a Level 3 Resource Catapult and can now launch Putty Rage during an attack to engrage monsters and make them more powerful.
pop_siloupgraded_streamtitle: #fname#'s Storage Silo has been upgraded to Level #v1#
pop_siloupgraded_streambody: #fname# can now store a huge cache of precious resources.
pop_clocbuilt_streamtitle: #fname# just built a Monster Locker and has hired top scientists to research new monsters.
pop_juicerbuilt_body: Congratulations, you've finished building the Monster Juice Loosener. Sacrifice monsters and return them to their original Goo form and keep the Monster Spirits happy. Beware of blood splatter - this building can get messy.
pop_juicerbuilt_streambody: #fname# built a Monster Juice Loosener that grinds up monsters and returns them to their original Goo form.
pop_juicerupgraded_body: Upgrade to level #v1# completed. You now get #v2#% Goo back when you send monsters to the MJL
pop_juicerupgraded_streamtitle: #fname#'s Monster Juice Loosener has been upgraded to Level #v1#
pop_juicerupgraded_streambody: #fname# now gets more Goo from blending monsters.
pop_protection_body:
You are protected from other players and wild monsters for
#v1# or until you attack someone.
pop_pokeyunlocked: Thanks for unlocking me. I might be small, but I'm quick to build and can help you find the best route into an enemy's base. Start hatching me already!
pop_octounlocked: What took you so long to unlock me? I'm the perfect battle companion. My favorite thing to do is to munch on Defensive Towers. Mmmm, Defensive Towers!
pop_boltunlocked: What's faster than a speeding bullet? Me! I'm the fastest monster ever created. I'm great for sprinting into enemy bases and devouring Resource Buildings. Gather some goo and start hatching me!
pop_finkunlocked: A little known fact about me is that my chemo-receptors are 30 times more powerful than the nose of a human, and people wonder why I'm so accurate in battle. Gather some goo, I'm ready to be hatched!
pop_eyeraunlocked: No need to get your eyes checked, I'm unlocked and ready to wreak havoc on your enemies. Send me into battle and I'll blow up any wall in sight. Trust me, my hatch time is well worth the wait.
pop_ichiunlocked: Did you know that my hide is used in bullet proof vests? Too bad Defense Towers are a little stronger than normal bullets, that being said, I'm still great for absorbing fire while other monsters do damage. Plus, there's nothing more delicious than eating towers
pop_banditounlocked: You've unlocked me, and now I will do your bidding. Consider me your monster assassin - send me into battle and I will destroy anything in my path. Don't believe me? Hatch me and see for yourself.
pop_fangunlocked: You thought Black Widows are dangerous? Well you haven't seen the likes of me. My fangs can take down any Wall, Tower or Resource Building. Send me into battle, I live for this type of stuff!
pop_brainunlocked: Unlocking me was the smartest thing you've done all week. Not to brag, but I graduated valedictorian from Backyard State and double majored in Looting Resources and Mechanical Engineering. Send me into battle and I'll use my superior intelligence to make sure you come out on top. Gather some goo and fire up the Hatchery!
pop_crabunlocked: While I might be as docile as a puppy dog in the ocean, I am an angle of death on land. Now that I am unlocked, I will cut down all of your enemy's towers with my razor-sharp claws. Start hatching me, I can't wait to get into battle.
pop_projectxunlocked: Where am I? Where did I come from? Are you my parent? For some reason I have an insatiable hunger for towers. Can you help me ease my hunger pangs?
pop_daveunlocked: D.A.V.E. good robot. D.A.V.E. kill! D.A.V.E. destroy! Hatch D.A.V.E. and send D.A.V.E. into battle!
pop_oops_body:
Reasons for errors include (but are not limited to):
* Having the game open in more than 1 place.
* Loss of internet connection.
* Your computer running too slowly.

We've logged the error, please reload to continue.

pop_youlooted_streambody: That was like taking candy from a baby!

snipertower_desc: Long range, high damage, but slow to reload. This tower picks off enemy monsters before they even get close. Protect a larger area with this tower.
stoneblock_desc: A stronger stone block takes longer to knock down. Protect key buildings from attackers.
storagesilo_desc: Increase your banks capacity of Twigs, Pebbles, Putty and Goo.

str_buyoften: You can buy this as often as you like

teslatower_desc: Talk about evil science, this high voltage tower fries any enemy that gets within range. Upgrade to improve number of shocks per charge, damage per shock and range.

th_upgradedesc: Upgrade to unlock new structures, upgrade levels and abilities.
th_willbuildmore: You will be able to build more:
th_willupgrade: You will be able to upgrade your:
townhall_desc: The hub of any great yard and the first building you need to build. Upgrading the Town Hall unlocks new buildings, features and lets you upgrade other buildings to a higher level.
tut_101:
Now let's use the Map Room to find the Wild Monster Tribe that attacked you and strike back with our Pokey army!

Click on the Map menu.
tut_102:
This is the Backyard Monster map.

Click on the Legionnaire Wild Monster base and select Attack!
tut_110: This is a Legionnaire Wild Monster base. Looks like they have no defenses!
tut_111:
On the left you can see the Pokeys you have in your Housing. Press the "+" icon to add them to the Flinger.

Click and hold the "+" to add at least 15 to the Flinger.
tut_112: Good, now select where you want to fling them. You can't fling in monsters too close to buildings so make sure the drop zone circle is white before you click it.
tut_113: Excellent! Your Pokeys have been flung in and are attacking the enemy yard
tut_113_more: Excellent! Your Pokeys have been flung in and are attacking the enemy yard. You can click the "+" to select some more and Fling them in to help if you want.
tut_114: I bet they wish they had defenses now!
tut_115: Your Pokeys are looting resources from their Resource Harvesters!
tut_116: Once their base is destroyed you'll be victorious.
tut_120: Congratulations, you leveled their entire backyard base!
tut_130: Good work, check out that loot!
tut_140: Build a Hatchery to start producing monsters! Click on the Buildings menu.
tut_144: Now, place it somewhere in your backyard.
tut_145: Don't forget to Speed Up the Hatchery construction.
tut_150:
Now that your Hatchery is ready try turning some Goo into monsters!

Click on the Hatchery and select View Hatchery.
tut_151: Click on Pokey to add it to the production queue. You can click on it several times to add more than one.
tut_152:
Good work!

When you are done close the Hatchery.
tut_160: Unlocking Monsters and keeping your Hatchery in production requires Putty and Goo. Let's build some Putty and Goo Harvesters. Click on the Buildings menu.
tut_164: Now, place it somewhere in your backyard.
tut_170: Build a Goo Factory. Click on the Buildings menu.
tut_174: Place it somewhere in your backyard.
tut_180: Nice job! Your backyard base is now ready for action! Try upgrading your 'Town Hall' to unlock better buildings.
tut_181: Also, build the 'Monster Locker' and unlock new monsters!
tut_190: While this counter is here other players can't attack you.
tut_191:
Check the Quests list to see what you should be doing next to collect rewards.

Good luck!
tut_20:
Let's upgrade your Twig Snapper to Level 2 so it works faster.

Click on your Twig Snapper.
tut_22: Here you can see the benefits and cost of an upgrade. Click the Use Resources button to start.
tut_23: Click on the upgrading Twig Snapper.
tut_25:
Buy "Close Enough" to finish the upgrade instantly.

The "Close Enough" speed-up is free for upgrades with 5 minutes or less remaining.
tut_26:
Congratulations! Your Twig Snapper is now Level 2.

Click Quests to collect your reward.
tut_3:
Resource Harvesters work until they're full so it's important to empty them often.

Click on your Twig Snapper.
tut_31:
Now, let's build Sniper Tower to defend your yard.

Click on the Buildings menu.
tut_32:
Here you can browse all the different buildings you can add to your yard.

Click the Defensive buildings tab.
tut_34: Here you can see the description, requirements and cost of the Sniper Tower. Press Build.
tut_35: Now place it in your yard by clicking on the grass.
tut_36: Click on the Sniper Tower and select Speed Up.
tut_38: Your Sniper Tower is complete and will  now fire on any intruders that try to attack your base. Collect your reward!
tut_4: Click Bank to collect twigs from your Twig Snapper.
tut_40:
WHOA! Just in time, here come some Wild Monsters!

Don't worry, the Sniper Tower should make short work of them, just sit back and watch the action.
tut_42: Oooh, looks like you completed a rather bloody quest for defending your yard. Don't forget to collect the reward by clicking on Quests menu.
tut_44: That attack came from the nearby Legionnaire Wild Monster Tribe. Let's strike back before they get a chance to build up a larger attack!
tut_5: Nice work! You've banked #v1# Twigs. Twigs are used to build and upgrade structures.
tut_50: The first thing we need to do is build housing for your monster army. Click on the Buildings menu.
tut_54:
Place it somewhere in your backyard.

You can click and drag to move the backyard around to find space.
tut_55: Select your Monster Housing, then click on Speed Up.
tut_57:
We've recruited some Pokeys to help. Pokeys are a little slow and small but what they lack in strength they make up for in numbers!

Collect your reward now.
tut_60: Here's some Shiny to spend in the Store. Use some of it to hire a second worker.
tut_62:
Click Buy to hire a second worker.

Buying extra workers is a great way to get things done more quickly.
tut_63: You now have 2 workers and can build or upgrade 2 things at a time.
tut_65: Now let's build a Flinger so we can fling our Pokeys into the enemy backyard. Click on the Buildings menu.
tut_69: Place it somewhere in your backyard (remember, you can click and drag to find space).
tut_90: With the second worker let's build a Map Room at the same time. Click on the Buildings menu.
tut_95: Click on the Flinger and select Speed Up.
tut_96: Since the Flinger takes longer than 5 minutes to build, let's buy the "Finish Building NOW!' speed-up.
tut_97: Now Speed Up the construction of your Map Room in the same way.
tut_99: Time to collect some quest rewards for all that new construction!
tut_recycle_locked: Building recycling is locked during the tutorial.
twigsnapper_desc: Produces Twigs. Used in the construction of buildings
ui_needmoreroom:
Not enough room.
Build more or upgrade existing storage silos
ui_placeinstorage:
Remove this building from your yard and place in storage?

You will be able to build it again at no cost.

ui_worker_xbusy: You have #v1# workers so you can only have #v2# things upgrading or building  at a time, wait for your worker to finish or if you are impatient purchase another worker from the General Store
ui_worker_busy: Your worker is busy, wait for your worker to finish or if you are impatient purchase another worker from the 'General Store'
ui_worker_waitforfinish: Your worker is busy, you need to wait for your worker to finish.
ui_worker_impatient: If you are impatient you should build the 'General Store' next to buy an extra worker.
ui_worker_tute: You will be able to hire more workers soon.
wildmonsterbaiter_desc: Sprays a musk into the air that Wild Monsters can't resist causing them to flock to your base, a great way to test your defenses. If it gets too much for you the building has a siren you can use to scare them off.
woodenblock_desc: A simple block, use it to build walls to protect buildings and channel attackers into traps or closer to towers. Can be upgraded from wood to stone to metal to gold to black diamond.
yardplanner_desc: Quickly move some things around or completely remodel your layout! This building gives you a birds eye view of your Yard and makes moving buildings a snap.
str_code_bip_body2: Improves the capacity of all resources in your main yard by 10%.
str_code_hod2_body2: 6x the speed of all Hatcheries for 1 hour. Does not stack with other overdrives.
str_code_hod3_body2: 10x the speed of all Hatcheries for 1 hour. Does not stack with other overdrives.
str_code_hod_body2: Need to rebuild your monster army in a hurry? 4x the speed of all Hatcheries for 1 hour.
str_code_musk_body: Top off your Monster Baiter's Musk levels to attract larger groups of Wild Monsters.
str_code_pro1_body2: Gives you 24 hours protection in this yard from Player and Wild Monster attacks. Removed if you attack anyone.
str_code_pro2_body2: Gives you 7 days of protection in this yard from Player and Wild Monster attacks. Removed if you attack anyone.
str_code_pro3_body2: Gives you 28 days of protection in this yard from Player and Wild Monster attacks. Removed if you attack anyone.
bubble_getshiny: Click "Add" to get more Shiny for your yard.
str_resourcesfull: You have all the #v1# you can hold, build or upgrade Silos.
loc_tut_1:
You can only produce monsters you've unlocked in the Monster Locker.

Select a monster on the left and start unlocking!
bdg_resource_full: Building Full, production paused. Bank now!
bdg_tower_desc: Defends your yard from pesky creeps!
bdg_housing_recyclewarning: You can't recycle this building as some monsters will be made homeless. Send them into battle or build more housing first.
bdg_flinger_upgrade: Upgrade to increase the size of the bucket to fling in larger groups of monsters.
bdg_storage_upgrade: Increases your Bank's capacity for all resources by another  #v1# units.
pop_bunkerupgraded_body: Your Monster Bunker can now hold more monsters to defend your base.
pop_bunkerupgraded_streamtitle: #fname# upgraded their Monster Bunker to Level #v1#.
pop_bunkerbuilt_body: Construction of your Monster Bunker is finished. Load it with monsters to defend your base.
pop_bunkerbuilt_streamtitle: #fname#'s Monster Bunker is now fully operational.
mon_pokeystreambody: Like a swarm of ants, a roaming pack of Pokeys can devour a grown cow in less than five minutes.
mon_finkstreambody: Found deep inside Amazonia, Fink's chemo-receptors make its attacks deadly accurate.
mon_eyerastreambody: Warning: Eye-ra's chemical makeup combusts within close proximity to walls.
mon_banditostreambody: Bandito's thick exoskeleton and impeccable accuracy make it the perfect monster assassin.
mon_fangstreambody: Fang's bite releases a toxic venom which liquidates any target.
mon_brainstreambody: Cunning and greedy, Brain's pulsating cerebral cortex and high intelligence make him perfect for looting resources.
bunker_empty:
You don't have any monsters in your housing to move to this bunker.

Hatch some monsters or get them immediately from the store.
bunker_lowputty: You don't have enough Putty to transfer the selected monsters.
bunker_purchased:
Monsters purchased for #v1# Shiny.

They're in your bunker ready to defend your yard.
mon_octooozestreambody: The slimy Octo-ooze soaks up fire power like a sponge so other monsters can wreak havoc.
mon_boltstreambody: Bolt is fast as lightening and can run ahead of your other monsters to munch on buildings with razor sharp teeth.
mon_ichistreambody: Discovered on the peak of Mt. Fuji, Ichi is one of the deadliest monsters and can withstand intense damage from towers and traps.
mon_crabatronstreambody: Using its claws to snap towers like twigs, Crabatron strikes fear into the heart of #fname#'s enemies.
mon_projectxstreambody: Project X is programmed to attack defense towers in battle.
bunker_tut_1: Add monsters to the Monster Bunker by moving them from Monster Housing or buy them directly from the store.
bunker_tut_2: When enemies are within range, "bunkered" monsters will attack. (They will fight to the death, so be sure to add more after each attack).
bunker_tut_3: Once monsters have been added to a Monster Bunker, they cannot be removed. Their only way out is death: either killed in battle or sent to the Monster Juicer.
tut_25_b: Use the speedup to finish the upgrade instantly.
tut_90_b: Let's build a Map Room. Click on the Buildings menu.
outpost_desc: Upgrading the Outpost unlocks new buildings, features and lets you upgrade other buildings to a higher level.
bunker_upgrade_desc: Increases the Bunker capacity and defensive range, letting you protect larger areas with your monsters
bunker_locker_desc: Unlock #v1# in the Monster Locker to add them to the bunker.
bdg_silo_upgrade: Increases your Banks capacity for all resources by another #v1#
bdg_catapult_upgrade: Upgrade the Resource Catapult to increase its range and firepower.
outpost_upgradedesc: The outpost can not be upgraded.
msg_cantrecycleoutpost: You can not Recycle your Outpost
newmap_bm_name: Please enter a name for this bookmark.
newmap_bm_long: This bookmark name is too long.
newmap_bm_full: You have too many bookmarks. Please remove one and try again.
newmap_bm_done: You have already bookmarked this location.
newmap_tr_space: #v1# monsters successfully transferred.  There was not enough space for all the monsters.
newmap_tr_err1: You don't have any Monster Housing at this Outpost.
newmap_tr_err2: You can only transfer monsters to Outposts you control.
newmap_g1:
A Brave New World

Welcome to the World Map! You can now control more than one backyard by conquering land and building Outposts.
newmap_g2:
Increased Range

The Flinger in your Main Yard now has increased range!
  • Flinger Level 1: 4 hexes
  • Flinger Level 2: 6 hexes
  • Flinger Level 3: 8 hexes
  • Flinger Level 4: 10 hexes
The catapult in your Main Yard can now hit any yard you are able to fling monsters into.
newmap_g3:
Outpost Takeover

After you destroy 90% of a wild monster or player's Outpost, you will get the option to "Take Over" their yard.
newmap_g4:
Starter Kits

After taking over a wild monster yard, you can choose between three different starter kits to help build your Outpost, but after destroying a player's Outpost, you gain control of all their buildings!
newmap_g5:
Damage Protection Rules

Outposts may get a short amount of Damage Protection if you fail to destroy them. However, an Outpost will get a longer period of protection when ownership changes hands or when a player returns to their destroyed Outpost.
newmap_g6:
Auto-Bank Resources

Outposts will now automatically bank resources over time, allowing you to spend more time building your empire.

newmap_sk_hlp:
Don't wait to level up, get a jump on the competition with an Outpost Starter Kit!

While Starter Kits will build instantly if purchased with Shiny, they will still take time to build if purchased with resources. Starter Kits streamline the base building process and don't require a worker.

newmap_des_pl1: You have destroyed this outpost and can now take it and all its buildings.
newmap_des_wm2: You have destroyed the Town Hall of this Wild Monster yard! They won't be bothering you for a while.
newmap_des_pl2: You have destroyed this player's yard, well done!

Expand your Backyard Empire!

Upgrade your Map Room to Level 2
and control more than one backyard base.

Branch out, conquer enemies and achieve backyard supremacy!

Recycling the Map Room will remove you from the World Map. If you recycle now:

  • Your empire value will be reduced accordingly
Are you sure you want to continue?
newmap_recycle2: Recycling the map room will cause you to be unable to see or attack other players, however your yard will still be vulnerable to attacks. Are you sure you want to continue?

newmap_upgraded2: You've unlocked the World Map and can now control more than one backyard base. Branch out, conquer enemies and achieve backyard supremacy!

newmap_destroyed3: In war, there are no unwounded monsters.
newmap_destroyed4: You destroyed #v1#'s Outpost. Take over their yard and expand your empire.
radio_desc: Never be caught off guard again! Get email alerts while you're away from your yard. Select from the options below to set up your alerts (2 per day maximum).

desc_metalwalls: Instantly upgrades #v1# of your blocks to Metal, saving you #v2# resources.
desc_goldwalls: Instantly upgrades #v1# of your blocks to Gold, saving you #v2# resources.
desc_repairbdgs: Instantly repair the #v1# damaged buildings in this yard now (buildings under 5 minutes are still free).
upgradeth: Upgrade your Town Hall to level #v1#.
upgradeth8: Upgrade your Town Hall to Level 8
str_canbuildmore: You will be able to build more:
str_selectsk:
Select a starter kit or close this window to start from scratch.

Click on an image to enlarge.
radio_recycledesc: Recycling this building will unsubscribe you from messages.
radio_upgradedesc: This building can not be upgraded.
mon_teratorndesc:
With its swift wings and fiery breath, the flying Teratorn rains death from above.
Favorite Target: Anything
mon_teratornstream: Lookout below! #fname# unlocked the flying Teratorn.
mon_teratornstreambody: With its swift wings and fiery breath, Teratorn rains death from above.
empiredestroyed1: Your main yard was destroyed.  It's not all doom and gloom, you can relocate your base to a new random location for free.
empiredestroyed2: Your main yard and outpost were destroyed.  It's not all doom and gloom, you can recloate your base to a new random location for free.
empiredestroyed3: Your main yard and #v1# outposts were destroyed.  It's not all doom and gloom, you can relocate your base to a new random location for free.
empiredestroyed_title: Your empire has been overrun by your enemies!
empiredestroyed_newbase: Your main yard has now been moved to a new location. Click on MAP to view your position and begin rebuilding your empire.
invite_body: Move your main yard next to mine and we can work together to dominate the world map!
str_code_tod_body: BOOM! This power-up increases the amount of damage your defense towers inflict by 25% for 24 hours.
str_code_mod_body: CHOMP! This power-up increases the amount of damage your monsters inflict by 25% for 24 hours.
str_code_tod_streambody: #fname# just purchased the Tower Overdrive power-up.
str_code_mod_streambody: #fname# just purchased the Monster Dust power-up.
tod_body: Your towers now do 25% extra damage for 24 hours.
mod_body: Your monsters now inflict extra damage for 24 hours.
flaktower_desc: Fast-firing cannon designed to nullify or reduce the effectiveness of hostile air action.
exh_body: You now have 25% more space in Housing for 24 hours.
str_code_exh_streambody: #fname# just purchased the Housing Expansion power-up.
mon_zafreetidesc: From deep within the Sahara, comes the mystical Zafreeti healer.
kit_warning: WARNING:  Building a starter kit on this Outpost will replace all existing buildings.  Do you wish to continue?
pop_aabuilt_body: The Aerial Defense Tower is now fully operational.
str_closeenough_powerupdesc: When there's less than 5 minutes remaining you can finish #v1#'s #v2# for free.
str_closeenough_powerupdesc_ok: There's less than 5 minutes remaining, you can finish #v1#'s #v2# for free.
lab_boltdesc: Adds the ability to blink increasing speed.
lab_boltstream_upgrade: #fname# upgraded Bolt's Teleportation ability to Level #v1#.
lab_banditostream_upgrade: #fname# upgraded Bandito's Whirlwind ability to Level #v1#.
lab_braindesc: Gives the Brain the ability to turn invisible causing towers not to attack it.
lab_brainstream_upgrade: #fname# upgraded Brain's Invisibility power to Level #v1#.
lab_projectxdesc: Adds the ability to unleash acid when the Project X dies.
lab_projxstream_unlock: #fname# unlocked Project X's Acid Spore special ability.
lab_projxstream_upgrade: #fname# upgraded Project X's Acid Spore ability to Level #v1#.
lab_davedesc: Gives D.A.V.E. the ability to fire rockets increasing the damage he does.
lab_davedesc_u: Increases the range of DAVES rockets.
lab_davestream_upgrade: #fname# upgraded D.A.V.E.'s Rocket-Firing ability to Level #v1#.
lab_wormzerdesc: Adds the ability to do extra splash damage when Wormzer pops up.
lab_wormstream_unlock: #fname# unlocked Wormzer's Splash Damage special ability.
lab_wormstream_upgrade: #fname# upgraded Wormzer's Splash Damage ability to Level #v1#.
lab_teratorndesc: Adds the ability for attacks to bounce off of buildings doing damage to multiple targets.
lab_teratorndesc_u: Increases the number of targets struck.
lab_terastream_upgrade: #fname# upgraded Teratorn's Ricochet ability to Level #v1#.
lab_err_cantupgrade:
You can not upgrade this Monster Lab as it's currently researching.

First open it and cancel the research.
lab_err_cantrecycle:
You can not recycle this Monster Lab as it's currently researching.

First open it and cancel the research.
lab_confirmcancel: Are you sure you want to stop researching #v1#'s #v2#?
pop_labbuilt_body: You can now begin researching new powers for your monster army!
monsterlab_desc: Research top secret abilities for your monsters.  In war, science rules!
q_cm1_description: Hatch Gorgo in the Champion Cage.
q_cm1_hint: Build the Monster Cage to hatch Gorgo.
q_cm2_description: Evolve Gorgo to Level 6 and watch him "go bananas" on your enemies.
q_cm3_description: Hatch Drull in the Champion Cage.
q_cm3_hint: Build the Monster Cage to hatch Drull.
q_cm4_description: Evolve Drull to Level 6 and swallow your enemies whole!
q_cm5_description: Hatch Fomor in the Champion Cage.
q_cm5_hint: Build the Monster Cage to hatch a Champion Monster.
q_cm6_description: Evolve Fomor to Level 6 and watch your enemies tremble with fear.
q_cm7_hint: The more evolved the Champion, the more difficult it will be to defeat!
q_cm8_description: Feed your Champion other monsters and watch him evolve to Level 2.
q_cm9_description: Feed your Champion other monsters and watch him evolve to Level 3.
q_cm10_description: Feed your Champion other monsters and watch him evolve to Level 4.
q_cm11_description: Feed your Champion other monsters and watch him evolve to Level 5.
mon_gorgodesc: Discovered inside the Bermuda Triangle, Gorgo is a powerful 'tank' monster of simian origin.
mon_drulldesc: Covered in red obsidian scales, this two-headed beast delivers overwhelming damage during attacks.
mon_fomordesc: Known in the northern isles as the 'Flying Frog of Death', Fomor's presence provides a 'buff' to your monster army, granting armor and speed to nearby monsters.
q_cm2_hint: Make sure you feed your Gorgo what it needs to grow big and strong.
q_cm4_hint: Make sure you feed your Drull what it needs to grow big and strong.
q_cm6_hint: Make sure you feed your Fomor what it needs to grow big and strong.
monstercage_desc: Hatch and evolve a Champion Monster to attack your enemies and defend your base.
heavytrap_desc: Invisible to enemies until it's too late, Heavy Traps use a specialized trigger that only fires when the most powerful monsters step on it, but cause splash damage to all nearby units.
desc_blackwalls: Instantly upgrades #v1# of your blocks to Black Diamond, saving you #v2# resources.
str_code_mdod_body: Reduces damage inflicted to your monsters by 30% for 24 hours.
mdod_body: Your monsters will now take 30% less damage during attacks for 24 hours.
str_code_msod_body: Increases the speed of your monsters by 50% for 24 hours.
msod_body: Your monsters will now move 50% faster for 24 hours.
pop_sentinvite_title:
#v1# accepted your invite. Send them a free gift or visit their yard to help speed-up their building construction time?

You earned...
railguntower_desc: An electrical gun that accelerates a conductive projectile along a pair of rails, the Railgun Tower makes up for its limited range with high damage and an infinite line of fire.
tips_hint1: Don't neglect your Harvesters.  Bank often to keep the resources flowing.
tips_hint2: Base upgrade a drag?  Buy more workers and speed things up!
tips_hint3: Want to be clued into the carnage?  Like us on Facebook and get the latest news and updates to Backyard Monsters
tips_hint4: Log in early and often - we're always bringing something new to the yard.
tips_hint5: Need intel?  Join the forum to learn the ins and outs of gameplay.
tips_hint6: The sooner you upgrade your Harvesters, the sooner you'll collect.  More resources = more power!
tips_hint7: Be a pal - send a Shipment chock full of goods.
tips_hint8: Full silos?  Not a problem if you're collecting resources from quests!
tips_hint9: Friends can offer you a certain amount of protection - make nice with your neighbor and gain an ally.
tips_hint10: Keep your eyes on your Town Hall and Silos - where the loot is - don't sweat the small stuff.
tips_hint11: Protect key buildings with strategically placed Booby Traps - this bloody surprise for enemy monsters is worth the planning.
tips_hint12: With great patience comes great reward.  Upgrade your walls and make your yard a fortress!
tips_hint13: Feeding time!  Evolve your Monster Champion and put the ultimate killing machine to work protecting your yard.
tips_hint14: Keep a clear head when looting - use Brain and get more loot back to your yard during attacks.
tips_hint15: Crack key buildings and rock enemy foundations with the resource catapult.
tips_hint16: Want to see how your yard stacks up?  Reel 'em in with the Wild Monster Baiter and test your defenses.
tips_hint17: Drive your monsters berserk with Putty Rage - they'll shred enemy yards.
tips_hint18: Want to mess with the big dogs?  Build a Heavy Trap and leave a trail of monster bits all over your yard.
tips_hint19: Need a better way through your enemy's gates?  Change up your attacks - visit the Monster Laboratory for new abilities.
tips_hint20: Tired of the same old Champion day in and day out?  Start fresh.  Juice him in the Monster Juicer and hatch a new one!
q_ga1_description:
Have five gifts accepted by your friends.
#sentgiftsaccepted#/5 gifts accepted
q_ga1_hint: Your friends must accept each gift to complete this quest.
q_ga1_streamdescription: #fname# just completed the #questname# Quest and collected #collected# as a reward.
q_ga2_description:
Have 25 gifts accepted by your friends.
#sentgiftsaccepted#/25 gifts accepted
q_ga2_hint: Your friends must accept each gift to complete this quest.
q_ga2_streamdescription: #fname# just completed the #questname# Quest and collected #collected# as a reward.
q_ga3_description:
Have 50 gifts accepted by your friends.
#sentgiftsaccepted#/50 gifts accepted.
q_ga3_hint: Your friends must accept each gift to complete this quest.
q_ga3_streamdescription: #fname# just completed the #questname# Quest and collected #collected# as a reward.
pop_railgunbuilt_body: Construction of your Railgun is finished.
tips_hint21: Time marching too slowly?  Pick up the pace with some Shiny and get instant gratification for your upgrade!
tips_hint22: Research Bandito's Whirlwind in the Monster Laboratory and leave Pokeys and Octo-Oozes choking on your dust.
tips_hint23: Keep a steady supply of monsters in the Monster Bunker - they'll lie in wait and leap to your aid when enemy monsters attack.
tips_hint24: Teratorns will fall at your feet once you upgrade your Aerial Defense Towers.
tips_hint25: Buy yourself something nice - spend some Shiny and reap instant rewards.
tips_hint26: Eye-ras in your Monster Bunker are a game changer - blow the enemy away when they launch an attack.
tips_hint27: Upgrade your Map Room and step onto the world stage.  Word of your empire will spread as you expand.
tips_hint28: An Outpost a day keeps an attacker at bay.
tips_hint29: Hurting for resources?  Low level Outposts give great production.
tips_hint30: Ramp up to a good defense with an Outpost level that's sky high.
tips_hint31: Add Outposts and enjoy the spoils of expanding your empire - more armies, more resources.
tips_hint32: Need an empire in a hurry?  Buy Starter Kits and get your Outpost defenses battle-ready.
tips_hint33: There's strength in numbers - cozy up to your friends and invite them to move their main Yard next to yours on the World Map.
map_alliance_recycle: You must leave the #v1# Alliance before you can recycle your Map Room.  Go to the My Alliance Tab and select, "Leave" to end your current Alliance.
map_attack_ally: #v1# is in your Alliance.  Are you sure you want to attack them?
map_attack_allyfriend: #v1# is currently allied with your Alliance.  Are you sure you want to attack them?
q_em1_description: Build the Radio Tower to get email alerts.
q_em1_hint: The Radio Tower can be found in the Building Manager under the 'Buildings' tab.
q_em1_streamdescription: #fname# built the Radio Tower and collected #collected# as a reward.
radio_unsavedChanges: You have unsaved changes, are you sure you want to close this window?
radio_enterValidEmail: You must enter a valid email address if you wish to receive alerts from Backyard Monsters.
radio_build_desc: Never be caught off guard again! Get email alerts while you're away from your yard.

If you still want to receive notifications build a new Radio Tower.

If you need to adjust your email preferences, simply revisit the Radio Tower at any time.

ap_armament_desc:
Armament

lab_octodesc: Upon death, Octo-ooze has a chance of splitting into two, weaker oozes that can continue to attack.

wmi_popup1: Hit hard by an unexpected scarcity of resources, all four Wild Monster Tribes have banded together and are hatching an army of epic proportions to raid Yards and stockpile for the winter. Be prepared for wave after wave of attacks on Thursday, November 10th.
wmi_popup2: Wild Monster Tribes have been training day and night and will launch attacks of epic proportions in a last ditch effort to collect a massive amount of resources. Be prepared - the fight begins on November 10th.
wmi_popup3: First blood will soon be drawn. Wild Monsters will seek to rob you of your hard-earned resources. Will you stand and fight? The war begins in less than one day!
bdg_wmitotem1_desc: You completed the first wave of the Backyard Monsters Wild Monster Invasion
bdg_wmitotem2_desc: You completed 10 waves of the Backyard Monsters Wild Monster Invasion
bdg_wmitotem3_desc: You completed 20 waves of the Backyard Monsters Wild Monster Invasion
bdg_wmitotem4_desc: You completed 30 waves of the Backyard Monsters Wild Monster Invasion
wmi_popup4: Battle 30 waves of Wild Monster attacks within the coming week. You set the pace, but all attacks must be executed by November 17th. Defend your Yard and win a Victory Totem Pole. A special surprise awaits those who conquer the 30th wave. Let the bloodbath begin!
wmi_winwave1: You crippled the 1st wave of Wild Monsters, leaving nothing behind but blood and mayhem. Here's a One-Headed Victory Totem to honor your success. Survive the 10th wave and receive your next Totem.
wmi_winwave10: You crushed the 10th wave of Wild Monsters -- your yard is drenched in beastly blood. And you like it. Here's a Two-Headed Victory Totem to honor your brute strength. Survive the 20th wave and receive your next Totem.
wmi_winwave20: You butchered the 20th wave of Wild Monsters -- your own monsters have no shortage of bones to gnaw. Here's a Three-Headed Victory Totem to honor your triumph. Survive the 30th wave and receive your next Totem.
wmi_winwave30: You exterminated the 30th wave of Wild Monsters, your battle cries will echo through the Backyard Universe for weeks to come. Here's a Four-Headed Victory Totem to honor your might. Survive this bonus wave and receive a Gold Totem.
wmi_winwave31: You annihilated the fiercest and final wave of Wild Monsters -- the biggest badass in the Backyard is YOU! Here's a Gold Victory Totem to show the world your power.
wmi_winwave: You've defeated another wave of Wild Monsters, but there's more to come.  Repair now or start the next wave.
wmi_losewave: You've suffered a bitter defeat with this wave of Wild Monsters. You'll need to survive with more than 10% yard health in order to advance. Repair and improve your defenses to put an end to these relentless attacks.
wmi_waverank: You are the #v1# person to complete Wave #v2#!
wmi_wave1streamtitle: #fname# defeated the 1st wave of attacks in Backyard Monsters Wild Monster Invasion.
wmi_wave1streamdesc: A little blood on the grass is great for fertilizing the yard.
wmi_wave10streamtitle: #fname# defeated the 10th wave of attacks in Backyard Monsters Wild Monster Invasion.
wmi_wave10streamdesc: Severed monster limbs make perfect yard decorations -- who needs garden gnomes?
wmi_wave20streamtitle: #fname# defeated the 20th wave of attacks in Backyard Monsters Wild Monster Invasion.
wmi_wave20streamdesc: The sweet sound of bones crunching underfoot is its own kind of music.
wmi_wave30streamtitle: #fname# defeated the 30th wave of attacks in Backyard Monsters Wild Monster Invasion.
wmi_wave30streamdesc: A hefty cleanup is now underway. Mind the Wild Monster intestines scattered around the yard.
wmi_wave31streamtitle: #fname# defeated the Bonus wave in Backyard Monsters Wild Monster Invasion.
wmi_wave31streamdesc: True warriors have gold Victory Totem Poles.
bdg_wmitotem5_desc: You completed the bonus wave of the Backyard Monsters Wild Monster Invasion
wmi_surrender: Did the last Wild Monster wave overrun your base? You can't give up that easily! Improve your defenses and call them back for more.

sidebar_attackingdisable:
Attacking disabled - pending game update
We are about to update the game! Updates sometimes cause errors for those playing, for this reason we have paused the ability to start attacks to prevent you wasting your monsters.

After the update you can check the forum (press "Discuss" above the game) for the list of changes.
sidebar_protectedfor:
WARNING - You are protected for #v1#

Attacking anyone will remove your protection and leave you open to attacks from others.
sidebar_attackfriend: Really?! You want to attack ' #v1#? We thought you were friends.
sidebar_attackconfirm: Are you sure you want to attack #v1#?
sidebar_warnhigherlvl:
You can attack #v1# but they're a higher level than you and your monsters will have a tough time overpowering their defenses.

Also, if you do attack them, they'll have the ability to retaliate. Chances are they will destroy your base. Your call, but don't say we didn't warn you!
sidebar_warninglowlvl: You can't attack this person because their base is too low for someone as strong as you. It would be unfair. Try picking on someone your own size!
sidebar_revengelowlvl:
Normally you wouldn't be able to attack a person whose level is so much lower than yours, but they were dumb enough to attack you first!

We'll let you attack them as many times as they attacked you to teach them a lesson. As they say, "Revenge is a dish best served cold."
sidebar_damageprotection: #v1# was recently DESTROYED and is under protection for a few hours to give them a chance to rebuild.
sidebar_newplayer: #v1# is protected as they are new to Backyard Monsters. They will remain protected from attacks for a few more days or until they attack someone.
sidebar_underattackby: #v1# is under attack by #v2#! Please wait a few minutes then try again
sidebar_truce: You have a truce with #v1# and can not attack them and they can not attack you.
sidebar_buildflinger: You need to build a Flinger to fling your Monsters into an enemy yard. You can find the Flinger under 'Special Structures'
sidebar_upgradingflinger: Your Flinger is upgrading and can't be used to fling monsters until it is finished.
sidebar_damagedflinger: Your Flinger is more than 50% damaged and can not function, please repair to to resume flinging.
mail_disabled:

wmi_winwave32: Congratulations! You've defeated everything the Wild Monsters have thrown your way. You are truly a master of your yard!
wmi_eventover: Although many of you fought off the Wild Monsters, they still managed to loot all the resources they needed.  Their attacks have quieted down... for now.
wmi_extension: <font size='11'>Wild Monsters aren't done with you yet! How much more can you take? The Wild Monster Invasion is now extended to 12 p.m. PST, Sunday November 20th. Repair your Yard and face a new final 32nd wave.</font>
wmi_tshirt: <font size="14">You gave your all to conquer the Wild Monsters storming your yard, now reward yourself and wear your victory on your chest. Get your exclusive "I Survived the Wild Monster Invasion" T-Shirt in the Backyard Monsters Store. Order before 12 p.m. PST Sunday and get 10% off your purchase. Just enter WILDMONSTERS as your promo code.</font>
